text: Hell in a Cell (2011) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by WWE. It took place on October 2, 2011 at the New Orleans Arena in New Orleans, Louisiana. It was the third Hell in a Cell event held by WWE. ==Matches== ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Hell in a Cell website Category:World Wrestling Entertainment pay-per-view events Category:2011 in professional wrestling Category:2010s in New Orleans Category:Sports in New Orleans
title: Hell in a Cell (2011)
